```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(vegan)
library(colorRamps)
library(psych)
library(tidyr)
library(readxl)

rm(list = ls())
load("data/CForBio.data.prep.2022.11.22.RData")

library(vegan)
cutoff <- 1000

sort(colSums(bac.amp1))
sort(colSums(bac.mgm1))
sort(colSums(ko.mgm1))
sort(colSums(cog.mgm1))
sort(colSums(rgi.mgm1))
sort(colSums(cazy.mgm1))

bac.amp <- rrarefy(t(bac.amp1),sample = 24903 )
bac.mgm <- data.frame(t(bac.mgm1))

ko.mgm <- data.frame(t(ko.mgm1))
cog.mgm <- data.frame(t(cog.mgm1))
rgi.mgm <- data.frame(t(rgi.mgm1))
cazy.mgm <- data.frame(t(cazy.mgm1))

env.amp1$rgi.mgm.H <- vegan::diversity(rgi.mgm)
env.amp1$cazy.mgm.H <- vegan::diversity(cazy.mgm)
env.amp1$ko.mgm.H <- vegan::diversity(ko.mgm)
env.amp1$cog.mgm.H <- vegan::diversity(cog.mgm)
env.amp1$bac.mgm.H <- vegan::diversity(bac.mgm)
env.amp1$bac.amp.H <- vegan::diversity(bac.amp)

env.amp1$rgi.mgm.S <- vegan::specnumber(rgi.mgm)
env.amp1$cazy.mgm.S <- vegan::specnumber(cazy.mgm)
env.amp1$ko.mgm.S <- vegan::specnumber(ko.mgm)
env.amp1$cog.mgm.S <- vegan::specnumber(cog.mgm)
env.amp1$bac.mgm.S <- vegan::specnumber(bac.mgm)
env.amp1$bac.amp.S <- vegan::specnumber(bac.amp)

env.amp1$cog.mgm.sum <- rowSums(cog.mgm)
env.amp1$rgi.mgm.sum <- rowSums(rgi.mgm)
env.amp1$cazy.mgm.sum <- rowSums(cazy.mgm)
env.amp1$ko.mgm.sum <- rowSums(ko.mgm)
env.amp1$bac.mgm.sum <- rowSums(bac.mgm)

#genomeTraits
genomeTrait<-read_excel("data/genomeTrait/genomeTraits_contigs500.xlsx",sheet = "Sheet1")

genomeTrait$sample_name == env.amp1$sample_name

env.genomeTraits<-cbind(env.amp1,genomeTrait[,c(3:18)])

#Fig.2a
summary(lm(env.genomeTraits$AGS2~env.genomeTraits$pH))
shapiro.test(residuals(lm(env.genomeTraits$AGS2~env.genomeTraits$pH)))

p11<-ggplot() + geom_jitter(data=env.genomeTraits,  height = 0, aes(x= pH, y=AGS2, color = site.latitude), alpha = 0.8, size =5) + 
  geom_smooth(data=env.genomeTraits,aes(x= pH, y=AGS2), method ="lm", col= "white")+
  labs(x = "pH",y = "Average Genome Size (Mbp)")+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_colour_manual(values= c(blue2red(15)[1:5], blue2red(17)[11:15], "green", "black"))+
  theme(legend.title = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold"),
        legend.text = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold"),
        axis.text=element_text(size=12,face="bold"),
        axis.title=element_text(size=12,face="bold"))+
  annotate("text",x=6.5,y=6, label="R2 = 0.401\nP = 2.033e-05",
           size=5,color="black")
p11

#Fig.2b
summary(lm(env.genomeTraits$GC_all~env.genomeTraits$pH))
shapiro.test(residuals(lm(env.genomeTraits$GC_all~env.genomeTraits$pH)))

p12<-ggplot() + geom_jitter(data=env.genomeTraits,  height = 0, aes(x= pH, y=GC_all, color = site.latitude), alpha = 0.8, size =5) + 
  geom_smooth(data=env.genomeTraits,aes(x= pH, y=GC_all), method ="lm", col= "white")+
  labs(x = "pH",y = "GC Content (%)")+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_colour_manual(values= c(blue2red(15)[1:5], blue2red(17)[11:15], "green", "black"))+
  theme(legend.title = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold"),
        legend.text = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold"),
        axis.text=element_text(size=12,face="bold"),
        axis.title=element_text(size=12,face="bold"))+
  annotate("text",x=6.5,y=59, label="R2 = 0.392\nP = 2.627e-05",
           size=5,color="black")
p12

#Fig.3c
summary(lm(env.genomeTraits$ACN8~env.genomeTraits$pH))
shapiro.test(residuals(lm(env.genomeTraits$ACN8~env.genomeTraits$pH)))

p13<-ggplot() + geom_jitter(data=env.genomeTraits,  height = 0, aes(x= pH, y=ACN8, color = site.latitude), alpha = 0.8, size =5) + 
  geom_smooth(data=env.genomeTraits,aes(x= pH, y=ACN8), method ="lm", col= "white")+
  labs(x = "pH",y = "Average 16S Copy Number")+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_colour_manual(values= c(blue2red(15)[1:5], blue2red(17)[11:15], "green", "black"))+
  theme(legend.title = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold"),
        legend.text = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold"),
        axis.text=element_text(size=12,face="bold"),
        axis.title=element_text(size=12,face="bold"))+
  annotate("text",x=6.5,y=15, label="R2 = 0.09\nP = 0.0393",
           size=5,color="black")
p13

#Fig.2d
summary(lm(log(env.genomeTraits$Growthrate)~env.genomeTraits$pH))
shapiro.test(residuals(lm(log(env.genomeTraits$Growthrate)~env.genomeTraits$pH)))

p14<-ggplot() + geom_jitter(data=env.genomeTraits,  height = 0, aes(x= pH, y=Growthrate, color = site.latitude), alpha = 0.8, size =5) + 
  geom_smooth(data=env.genomeTraits,aes(x= pH, y=Growthrate), method ="lm", col= "white")+
  labs(x = "pH",y = "Minimal Doubling Time (hours)")+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_colour_manual(values= c(blue2red(15)[1:5], blue2red(17)[11:15], "green", "black"))+
  theme(legend.title = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold"),
        legend.text = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold"),
        axis.text=element_text(size=12,face="bold"),
        axis.title=element_text(size=12,face="bold"))+
  annotate("text",x=6.5,y=4, label="R2 = 0.014\nP = 0.489",
           size=5,color="black")
p14
```
